unnormalised: Good morning, folks! Just a quick update on that global conference call everyone’s been prepping for. Remember, the kickoff meeting is scheduled for 8:00 PM IST.
normalised: Good morning, folks! Just a quick update on that global conference call everyone's been prepping for. Remember, the kickoff meeting is scheduled for eight post meridiem I-S-T.

unnormalised: Now, for our colleagues joining from across the globe: that translates to 10:30 AM EST for our New York team and a very early 7:30 AM PST for those on the West Coast. For those in London, that’s 3:30 PM GMT.
normalised: Now, for our colleagues joining from across the globe: that translates to ten thirty ante meridiem E-S-T for our New York team and a very early seven thirty ante meridiem P-S-T for those on the West Coast. For those in London, that's three thirty post meridiem G-M-T.

unnormalised: Our friends in Sydney will be tuning in at 1:00 AM AEDT, so a big shoutout to them for burning the midnight oil! And our Mumbai office needs to be ready by 8 PM IST sharp - no excuses!
normalised: Our friends in Sydney will be tuning in at one ante meridiem A-E-D-T, so a big shoutout to them for burning the midnight oil! And our Mumbai office needs to be ready by eight post meridiem I-S-T sharp - no excuses!

unnormalised: Double-check your time zone conversions, and let’s make this call a success! Don't forget to set a reminder. Good luck!
normalised: Double-check your time zone conversions, and let's make this call a success! Don't forget to set a reminder. Good luck!
